duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise staff and oversee patient care in accordance with standards of care and practice and applicable state/federal regulations.
Perform nursing services including medication management and medical emergency response throughout residential and assisted living.
Interface with residents' physician regarding residents' condition, medications, and appointments or treatment.
Implement orders as required and update electronic medical records.
Attend residents' needs and complete various ADL assistance in cooperation with Care Partner Staff.

education_certification.credential: Certified as a Licensed Vocational Nurse per state regulations. First Aid and C.P.R. certified.
